title: Withdrawal Procedure
intro: Fund Withdrawal ({withdrawal}) can be requested by the Client at any time, provided that the amount withdrawn does not exceed the {effectiveMargin} stated in the Client's daily transaction report ({statementReport}).

steps.step1: Client logs in to the {withdrawal} menu on their real trading account to submit a withdrawal request in accordance with the applicable terms and conditions.
steps.step2: Client fills out the withdrawal request form completely and accurately.
steps.step3: Funds can only be transferred to an account under the Client's name that matches the previously approved Account Opening Application document.
steps.step4: The standard withdrawal process takes a maximum of {maxTime}. However, PT. Rifan Financindo Berjangka is committed to expediting the process to be completed within {targetTime}.
